card.name: Asham's Path
card.text: When Asham's Path enters, you gain 8 life. {1}{W}{W}: Transform Asham's Path. Activate only if your fealty to Plains is five or greater. --- (Back): Asham, God of Morality

card.name: Asham, God of Morality
card.text: Indestructible Asham, God of Morality's power is equal to your life total. Creatures you don't control have base power 1. --- (Front): Asham's Path

card.name: Mercantile Accords
card.text: As Mercantile Accords enters, choose a number. Whenever an opponent casts a spell with the chosen mana value, you draw a card and create a Treasure token.

card.name: Iekin's Portal
card.text: When Iekin's Portal enters, look at the top five cards of your library. Put one into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. {1}{U}{U}: Transform Iekin's Portal. Activate only if your fealty to Islands is five or greater. --- (Back): Iekin, God of Wisdom

card.name: Iekin, God of Wisdom
card.text: Indestructible You have no maximum hand size. Whenever an opponent draws a card, you draw a card. If you would lose the game other than for having 0 or less life, you win the game instead. (Another player winning the game does not cause you to lose the game.) --- (Front): Iekin's Portal

card.name: Hafiq the Wise
card.text: Hafiq the Wise has hexproof as long as you've cast a spell this turn. {U}, Discard a card with mana value X: Counter target spell with mana value X. {U}, Sacrifice another permanent with mana value X: Return target instant or sorcery card with mana value X from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Bal's Descent
card.text: When Bal's Descent enters, each player sacrifices a creature, discards two cards, and mills three cards. {1}{B}{B}: Transform Bal's Descent. Activate only if your fealty to Swamps is five or greater. --- (Back): Bal, God of Destiny

card.name: Bal, God of Destiny
card.text: Indestructible You may play cards from your graveyard. If you would draw one or more cards, mill that many cards instead. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere other than your library, exile it instead. --- (Front): Bal's Descent

card.name: Deathless Siege
card.text: You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. Whenever you're dealt damage, mill that many cards. {B}, Pay 2 life: Put target card in your graveyard on the bottom of your library.

card.name: Ninhasir's March
card.text: When Ninhasir's March enters, it deals 3 damage to any target. {1}{R}{R}: Transform Ninhasir's March. Activate only if your fealty to Mountains is five or greater. --- (Back): Ninhasir, God of Creation

card.name: Ninhasir, God of Creation
card.text: Indestructible When this creature transforms into Ninhasir, God of Creation, discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards plus one. Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy. --- (Front): Ninhasir's March

card.name: Emissary of Antiquity
card.text: Flying, haste Whenever Emissary of Antiquity deals combat damage to a player, you may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 3 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Sabne's Autumn
card.text: When Sabne's Autumn enters, search your library for a Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 3 life. {1}{G}{G}: Transform Sabne's Autumn. Activate only if your fealty to Forests is five or greater. --- (Back): Sabne, God of Harvest

card.name: Sabne, God of Harvest
card.text: Indestructible Lands you control have "{T}: Add {G}{G}." {5}{G}{G}: Double the power and toughness of each creature you control until end of turn. --- (Front): Sabne's Autumn

card.name: Magnific Wilderkin
card.text: At the beginning of each combat, if you control a creature with flying, Magnific Wilderkin gets +1/+1 and gains flying until end of turn. The same is true for first strike, double strike, deathtouch, haste, hexproof, indestructible, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, and vigilance.

card.name: Thriving Hydra
card.text: Trample, haste Thriving Hydra enters with four +1/+1 counters on it. When Thriving Hydra enters, for each other creature you control, put X +1/+1 counters on that creature, where X is four minus its power. Whenever Thriving Hydra attacks, double the number of +1/+1 counters on each creature you control.

card.name: Sandstreamer
card.text: Flash Flying When Sandstreamer enters, target permanent gains indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Keeper of Holy Lands
card.text: Chosen one ({W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Transform this permanent.) When Keeper of Holy Lands enters, you may search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, then shuffle and put that card on top. --- (Back): Watcher of Sacred Skies

card.name: Watcher of Sacred Skies
card.text: Flying Whenever a nontoken, noncreature, nonland permanent you control enters, create a token that's a copy of that permanent except it has no mana cost and it isn't legendary. --- (Front): Keeper of Holy Lands

card.name: Skyline Tracer
card.text: Survivors you control have flying.

card.name: Ridge Warden
card.text: This spell costs {2} less to cast and may be cast as though it had flash if an opponent searched their library this turn. When Ridge Warden enters, exile another target nonland permanent with mana value 4 or less until Ridge Warden leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Archangel of Accord
card.text: Flying Concord — When Archangel of Accord enters, if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, destroy all other creatures.

card.name: Bewitching Vapors
card.text: Exile target nonland permanent. Its controller gains 5 life.

card.name: Guiding Light
card.text: As Guiding Light enters, choose a color. You have hexproof from the chosen color. If a creature you control would be dealt damage by a source of the chosen color, prevent 1 of that damage.

card.name: Gentry Infiltrator
card.text: Whenever Gentry Infiltrator deals combat damage to a player, you may search that player's library for a creature card and exile it. If you do, that player shuffles. {2}{U}{U}: Gentry Infiltrator becomes a copy of a creature card exiled with it until end of turn.

card.name: Hajir Soothsayer
card.text: Whenever a Survivor you control enters, look at the top card of target opponent's library. You may have them put that card into their graveyard.

card.name: Horizon Augur
card.text: Chosen one ({W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Transform this permanent.) Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, scry 1, then Horizon Augur gets +1/+1 until end of turn. --- (Back): Maven of Perspective

card.text: Flying Whenever you cast a spell, draw a card, then put a +1/+1 counter on Maven of Perspective. --- (Front): Horizon Augur

card.name: Veiled Virtuoso
card.text: Flying Concord — At the beginning of your upkeep, if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, exile the top card of your library. You may cast that card this turn without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Decree of Bias
card.text: Counter target creature spell, planeswalker spell, or activated ability.

card.name: Morrow Probe
card.text: Target opponent mills five cards, then you exile up to two instant and/or sorcery cards from that player's graveyard. You may cast those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast them.

card.name: Astral Alignment
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if the number of permanents you control, the number of cards in your hand, and the number of cards in your graveyard are all equal, you win the game.

card.name: Sultan of Avarice
card.text: Menace At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay 3 life. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Gaunt Abnormality
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, mill two cards. {1}{B}{B}: Until end of turn, Gaunt Abnormality becomes a copy of target creature card in your graveyard, except it's 3/3.

card.name: Tomb Steward
card.text: Chosen one ({W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Transform this permanent.) When Tomb Steward enters, search your library for a card and put it into your graveyard. Then shuffle. --- (Back): Profaner of Graves

card.name: Profaner of Graves
card.text: Flying, lifelink Pay 5 life: Put target permanent card in a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. --- (Front): Tomb Steward

card.name: Selfish Journeyman
card.text: Whenever a Survivor you control dies, you draw a card and you lose 1 life.

card.name: Liege of Luxury
card.text: Flying Desecrate (When this creature enters, you may sacrifice an artifact or land.) When Liege of Luxury desecrates a permanent, target player reveals their hand. card.text: All creatures get -3/-3 until end of turn.

card.text: Whenever a source you control deals damage to a creature or planeswalker an opponent controls, exile that creature or planeswalker.

card.name: Brazen Sacrilege
card.text: Brazen Sacrilege deals 2 damage to any target. Until end of turn, if a red source you control would deal damage to that player or to that permanent's controller, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.

card.name: Promenade Banner
card.text: Promenade Banner enters tapped. {1}, {T}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Secluded Monument
card.text: When Secluded Monument enters, choose a color. Whenever you cast a spell of the chosen color, Secluded Monument becomes a 5/5 Golem creature until end of turn.

card.name: Zoetic Tomb
card.text: When Zoetic Tomb enters, exile target creature. {4}: Until end of turn, Zoetic Tomb becomes a Golem artifact creature with power and toughness equal to the exiled creature's base power and toughness.

card.name: Calcified Dunes
card.text: ({T}: Add {W}.) As Calcified Dunes enters, you may pay 1 life. If you don't, Calcified Dunes enters tapped.

card.name: Saturated Dunes
card.text: ({T}: Add {U}.) As Saturated Dunes enters, you may pay 1 life. If you don't, Saturated Dunes enters tapped.

card.name: Patron of Asham
card.text: Whenever Patron of Asham attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls with power less than or equal to your fealty to Plains. (Each Plains you control counts towards your fealty to Plains.) (Each Plain you control counts towards your fealty to Plains.)

card.name: Bazaar Equestrian
card.text: Concord — When Bazaar Equestrian enters, if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, you gain 4 life.

card.name: Lurking Lahasia
card.text: Concord — Lurking Lahasia has first strike and lifelink as long as there are four or more card types among permanents you control.

card.name: Scimitar Techniques
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+2 until end of turn. If that creature is white, create a white Aura enchantment token with enchant creature and "Enchanted creature has first strike" attached to that creature.

card.name: Buried by Time
card.text: Exile target artifact or enchantment with mana value 4 or less.

card.name: Outflank
card.text: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Hall of Remembrance
card.text: When Hall of Remembrance enters, create two 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. Whenever a Spirit you control enters, you gain 1 life.

card.text: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

card.name: Canyon Mystic
card.text: Whenever Canyon Mystic deals combat damage to a player, draw a card.

card.name: Sage of the Sands
card.text: Whenever a Survivor you control enters, scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)

card.name: Bazaar Informant
card.text: Whenever Bazaar Informant deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top card of that player's library. If it's a nonland card, put a +1/+1 counter on Bazaar Informant, then that player puts that card into their graveyard.

card.name: Sensory Gouger
card.text: {2U}, {T}: Target creature gets -4/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Oasis Glutton
card.text: Defender As long as your fealty to Islands is six or greater, Oasis Glutton can attack as though it didn't have defender. (Each Island you control counts towards your fealty to Islands.) (Each Island you control counts towards your fealty to Islands.)

card.name: Judicious Djinni
card.text: Flying Concord — When Judicious Djinni enters, if there are four or more card types among permanents you control, return target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Stabilize
card.text: Counter target artifact or sorcery spell.

card.name: Obscuring Sandstorm
card.text: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Concord — If there are four or more card types among permanents you control, draw a card.

card.name: Eccentric Musings
card.text: Choose two — • Scry 2. • Draw a card. • Untap up to one land.

card.name: Apt Countermeasure
card.text: Counter target spell. Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: Chart the Stars
card.text: Draw three cards, then discard a card.

card.name: One With the Wind

card.name: Dilapidate
card.text: Enchant artifact or creature When Dilapidate enters, tap enchanted permanent. Enchanted permanent loses all abilities and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 1 life.

card.name: Vengeful Cohort

card.name: Due Judgment
card.text: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
